title: SOME ONE GIVE ME A ANSWER
body: i had a chat ban and finished it, but still cant get key frag drops why is that ?

replies.body: that sucks than a month what a waste of time playing than off to cs for the time being xD

It isn't a specific time frame. If you come back in a month after not playing there is no guarantee that you are going to be able to earn loot again.

>[Signs of reform. Once your punishment has ended, you'll continue to be restricted from earning loot until you're recognized to have made significant progress in amending your past behavior.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209939463-Hextech-Crafting-Restrictions)
give it a few weeks or a month of good behavior and u should be able to recieve

> [{quoted}](name=Rocka,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=2vxPigwp,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-06-09T02:37:44.065+0000)
>
> give it a few weeks or a month of good behavior and u should be able to recieve

This.
